newsitem.title: BELGIUM: CREDIT COMMUNAL CUTS SAVINGS BOOK RATE FROM FRIDAY.
newsitem.headline: CREDIT COMMUNAL CUTS SAVINGS BOOK RATE FROM FRIDAY.

text.p: Communal/Gemeentekrediet said on Wednesday it would cut the base
rate on its savings book accounts to 2.5 percent from 3.0
The fidelity premium remains unchanged at 0.5 percent, the
CCB is the Belgian market leader in savings book accounts.
